b: when touches hand then become next in 1s, tell menu_open, tell body mpress
when touches hand then become next in 1s, tell menu_close, tell body mpress

when told emit_poly then emit gravity-free poly drink with 0

when told by body hand trigger let go right then trail end
when is not drawing then become untweened 1

when told menu_close then become untweened 1
